body_html:
here is a small example:
https://gist.github.com/abred/daf06a496ebb585212529b7c0ecbad02

the first dimension of the 2D Tensor is not known (None/-1)
when I change it to a fixed number it works.
I included the reshapes in the code snippet (def batch_norm), so when you run it as-is it should work (comment the if..reshapes to get the error)

body:
here is a small example:
https://gist.github.com/abred/daf06a496ebb585212529b7c0ecbad02

the first dimension of the 2D Tensor is not known (None/-1)
when I change it to a fixed number it works.
I included the reshapes in the code snippet (def batch_norm), so when you run it as-is it should work (comment the if..reshapes to get the error)
